duties_responsibilities.duty: Build out your own book of business and network with the top professionals in the industry.
Partner with hiring managers in client companies to understand their needs and consult them as a market specialist.
Source niche, senior level candidates and see them through the entire hiring process.
Receive commission on top of the competitive base salary with uncapped earning potential.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
